texto: how to use the other parts of ISO/IEC TR 15504 to conduct process assessments and make effective use of their results. The key determinant in the use of ISO/IEC TR 15504 is the purpose for which the assessment is being conducted. This may be: 2 © ISO/IEC ISO/IEC TR 15504-1:1998(E)  to promote an understanding of the software process;  to support process improvement;  to support process capability determination.
